core.planner
Interface Substituable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Term
All Known Implementing Classes:
Atom, Conjunction, Constant, Decomposition, Function, Literal, TaskAtom, TaskList, Variable
public interface Substituable

This interface defines the methods that must be implemented by substituable object.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object applySubstitution(Substitution substitution)
          Returns a new Object such that the variables appearing in the Substitution are replaced with the corresponding Term of the Substitution.
 java.lang.Object applySubstitution(Substitution alpha, boolean replaceVar)
          Returns a new Object such that the variables appearing in the Substitution are replaced with the corresponding Term of the Susbstitution.
 

Method Detail

applySubstitution

java.lang.Object applySubstitution(Substitution alpha,
                                   boolean replaceVar)
                                   throws SubstitutionException
Returns a new Object such that the variables appearing in the Substitution are replaced with the corresponding Term of the Susbstitution.

Parameters:
alpha - the Substitution to apply.
replaceVar - flag to indicate if the Substitution allows to instantiate Variable s not in the Substitution by a Constant with the Variable name.
Returns:
a substituted copy of the Literal.
Throws:
SubstitutionException - if an error occur during substitution.

applySubstitution

java.lang.Object applySubstitution(Substitution substitution)
                                   throws SubstitutionException
Returns a new Object such that the variables appearing in the Substitution are replaced with the corresponding Term of the Substitution.

Parameters:
substitution - the Substitution to apply.
Returns:
a substituted copy of the Object.
Throws:
SubstitutionException - if an error occur during substitution.
